The Best DTF Transfer Experience

Premium DTF Quality

Vibrant colors, soft hand feel, and exceptional durability. Our transfers last 50+ washes.

Fast Turnaround

Same-day processing on orders before 2PM. Get your transfers in 2-3 business days.

Gang Sheet Savings

Maximize your print area with gang sheets. Save up to 40% on bulk orders.

Unlimited Colors

Full color CMYK printing. Photos, gradients, and complex designs - no color limits.

Expert Support

Design help, heat press guidance, and order support from DTF printing experts.

Quality Guarantee

Not satisfied? We reprint or refund. 100% satisfaction guaranteed on every order.

Easy Application in 3 Simple Steps

How DTF Transfers Work

Our DTF transfers are designed for easy application on cotton, polyester, and blends.

Position the Transfer

Place the transfer precisely where you want it on the shirt, ensuring to avoid areas with large wrinkles.

Apply Heat

Press the transfer with the appropriate pressure for the following time.

Peel the Film

Wait until your transfer has cooled to warm, peel off the PET film in a smooth steady motion.

Ordering Information

How to Order DTF Transfers

  1. Upload Your Artwork – PNG with a transparent background works best!
  2. Choose Your Sheet Size – Our standard sheet sizes fit most designs, but we offer custom sizes too.
  3. Review Your Proof – Once you approve your design, we'll start printing!
  4. Apply & Enjoy – Press your transfer at 300–320°F for 10–15 seconds, and you're done!

Perfect Stickers Every Time

How UV DTF Stickers Work

Premium waterproof stickers that last. Perfect for branding, labels, and decorations.

Select Sticker Size

Choose from various sizes or go custom. We offer multiple sheet dimensions for all needs.

Prepare Surface

Clean the surface thoroughly. UV stickers adhere best to smooth, clean surfaces.

Apply & Press

Peel and stick with confidence. Our UV stickers are waterproof and UV-resistant for lasting durability.

Sticker Ordering Guide

How to Order UV DTF Stickers

  1. Choose Your Design – Upload your logo, artwork, or choose from templates.
  2. Select Size & Quantity – From small labels to large decals, we've got you covered.
  3. Approve Your Proof – Review the digital proof before we print.
  4. Receive & Apply – Waterproof and UV-resistant stickers ready to use!

Quality You Can Trust

Durable Prints That Last

  1. 50+ Wash Durability – Our transfers maintain vibrant colors after countless washes.
  2. Soft Hand Feel – Unlike screen printing, DTF transfers feel soft and flexible.
  3. Crack & Fade Resistant – Advanced inks ensure long-lasting results.
  4. Works on All Fabrics – Cotton, polyester, blends, and more.
